params._derivatives: Curve LP and/or liquidity gauge tokens to add
params._invariantProxyAssets: The ordered assets that act as proxies to the pool invariants, corresponding to each item in _derivatives, e.g., WETH for ETH-based pools

params._derivativeAmount: The amount of the derivative to convert

returns.underlyingAmounts_: The amount of each underlying asset for the equivalent derivative amount

params._derivative: The derivative for which to get the `DerivativeInfo`

getOwner().details: Ownership is deferred to the owner of the FundDeployer contract

returns.isSupported_: True if the asset is supported

params._derivatives: Curve LP and/or liquidity gauge tokens to add

addDerivatives(address[],address[]).notice: Adds Curve LP and/or liquidity gauge tokens to the price feed

calcUnderlyingValues(address,uint256).notice: Converts a given amount of a derivative to its underlying asset values

getDerivativeInfo(address).notice: Gets the `DerivativeInfo` for a given derivative

getOwner().notice: Gets the owner of this contract

isSupportedAsset(address).notice: Checks if an asset is supported by the price feed

removeDerivatives(address[]).notice: Removes Curve LP and/or liquidity gauge tokens from the price feed

userdoc.notice: Price feed for Curve pool tokens
